title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.168 - Hospital-based physician
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.168 - Hospital-based physician

State Regulations
A physician who spends the predominant part of his
practice time within one or more hospitals instead of in an office setting, or
providing services to one or more hospitals or their patients. Such physicians
have either a special financial arrangement with the hospital (salary or
percentage of fees collected), or bill patients separately for their services. Such physicians include directors of medical education, pathologists, anesthesiologists and radiologists, as well as physicians who staff emergency
rooms and outpatient departments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.168

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
